name: Need for Zombies
description:
This game is a skill test of survival with zombies. When you are ready, just push the lever and get started to eliminate zombies. There is some assisting staff that can help you with that. 

First is the barrel. The barrel contains gas that explodes when gets any bullet damage. It is good for big zombies' swarms. Don't waste them, and catch the moment;

The second is a first aid kit. Use when you have a lack of HP. There are only three prototypes as well; 

You have two types of weapons: a Gun and a Knife. Use the knife immediately in time.

Good luck! The game was made for a demo.
